item.title: My New Favorite Tool... ncdu
item.description: So today I found my new favorite command line tool, ncdu. This is a ncurses disk utilization tool that is great for finding what is filling up your file systems. Especially on servers that do not have a graphical interface. If you are like me, when I get file system alerts, it was an endless string of ‘du -h –max-depth=1’ commands. I would have to re-run that command as I drilled down through the directory structure.
